thread.title: Flexible, Part-Time Work in a Busy Artists Studio - Perfect for an Empty Nester or Mom
thread.title_full: Flexible, Part-Time Work in a Busy Artists Studio - Perfect for an Empty Nester or Mom

title: Flexible, Part-Time Work in a Busy Artists Studio - Perfect for an Empty Nester or Mom
text:
Flexible, Part-Time Work in a Busy Artists Studio - Perfect for an Empty Nester or Mom
Busy artists studio looking for people to help in the Shipping Department sending out heirloom gifts to people all over the world. If you love to gift wrap and have a good attention to detail, this is a great job for you! We find it works well for empty nesters looking for something to do out of the house, or moms with children in school, as we often work within school hours. We are a team of hard working and creative women and are flexible on working hours. For more information about the company please visit tricialowenfield.com. The location is 5 minutes from the Woodlands Parkway Wal-Mart, at the corner of FM 2978 and Hardin Store Road.
- ability to lift up to 20 lbs.
- able to stand for long periods of time
- positive attitude
- STRONG attention to detail
- flexibility on working hours
$13-15
Job Types(s):
Sales, Customer Service, Entertainer / Artist, Warehousing
Industry(s):
Retail
Employment Type:
Contract - Part Time, Work / Life Balance
Job Location(s):
The Woodlands, Tomball / Magnolia
Tricia Lowenfield Design
Name: Tricia Lowenfield
